divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north on Brookhaven Road. I was waiting at the traffic light at Brookhaven Road and RT 352. I saw what I thought was an airplane but it was reflecting the sunlight brilliantly. It looked cylindrical and closely resembled an airplane, but do to the reflection, I coudnt make out exact geometric shapes i.e. I dont know if it had wings. I observed this very quickly. I looked down at my cell phone for a about 1-2 seconds and when I looked up, the object was gone. There were some clouds in the sky, but not to the extent that I would describe the sky as "partly cloudy." The object was below the clouds when I first observed it moving east to west. It did not disappear into the clouds. It just simply vanished. I scanned the sky sweeping as far as to the west that I could - and the object wasgone
Summary: I saw a slow moving silver object moving east to west and then it vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Brookhaven
This sighting has never been favorited.
